channel.title: Requesting A Development And Help Layout!
channel.description:
[center][font=Verdana][size=12pt]- Requesting A Development And Help Layout -[/size][/font]
During looking through our community i've seen peoples questions, to be honest there poor. The forum is great, but i think we can turn this section around, making it alot more cleaner.
People ask the same question over and over again, so i designed a layout to stop this.
[b]Question:[/b] [i]The question or error that this person has.[/i]
[b]Last Update:[/b] [i]The last thing they updated on there server.[/i]
[b]Credits:[/b] [i]The person who helped them.[/i]
[b]How I Fixed This:[/b] [i]Tell the community how you fixed your error.[/i]
[code][b]Question:[/b] [i]The question or error that this person has.[/i]
[b]Last Update:[/b] [i]The last thing they updated on there server.[/i]
[b]Credits:[/b] [i]The person who helped them.[/i]
[b]How I Fixed This:[/b] [i]Tell the community how you fixed your error.[/i][/code]
I think that this is a brilliant idea, it can tell people how they solved the error. It can also show the thanks to the person who helped them. People don't usually thank the people who helped them.
I hope some of you care for the community, if you don't want anymore mass deletions then i suggest you agree with my layout.
Thankyou.
-[u][b]Slivion[/b][/u]
[b]Credits:[/b] [i]Me[/i]
[b]Anti-Leech[/b][/center]

[center][font=Verdana][size=12pt]- Requesting A Development And Help Layout -[/size][/font]

During looking through our community i’ve seen peoples questions, to be honest there poor. The forum is great, but i think we can turn this section around, making it alot more cleaner.

People ask the same question over and over again, so i designed a layout to stop this.

Question: The question or error that this person has.

Last Update: The last thing they updated on there server.

Credits: The person who helped them.

[code]Question: The question or error that this person has.

Credits: The person who helped them.

I think that this is a brilliant idea, it can tell people how they solved the error. It can also show the thanks to the person who helped them. People don’t usually thank the people who helped them.

I hope some of you care for the community, if you don’t want anymore mass deletions then i suggest you agree with my layout.
